attributes.action: Restore the link between state pension rates and average wage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To restore the link between the rate of basic state pension and average male wage which was lost as a result of action by the Thatcher government in the 1980's

Pension rates were then, and continue to be linked to the rate of inflation. Basic pension today stands at just over £90 per week. This results in poverty, hunger and cold for many older people in Britain today.

Defend the living standards of the elderly and vulnerable and petition for social justice.
